long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A few political candidates (and thousands of reporters, campaigners, and hangers-on around them) have turned our social media into a political wasteland!

Well it's time to Make The Internet Great Again!

This extension removes almost all mentions of specific candidates and the political machine from your twitter feed. 

It's as simple as that. Install extension. Use Twitter with vastly fewer political distractions.

Because we all need a break from this madness.
